description: These unisex snow socks offer the best of their latest technologies, including their 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in fit and our patent-pending Indestructawool™ technology for amazing durability. For a higher level of comfort, these socks are designed with responsibly sourced Merino wool, which naturally helps with temperature regulation, odor control, and breathability, as well as body-mapped mesh zones and a Virtually Seamless™ toe. And best yet, they sport the Canadian flag, so you can show your support with pride.
name: Smartwool Performance Snow Full Cushion Canada Flag Over The Calf Socks - Mens
